      switch them

9.1.22  12:02 pm   in "might quit", the paddle game animated after the line "and i'll tell you what those sounds said" was in 3D. was this, in any way, a test of your 3D animating skills

     i had already been using 3D in several videos before that

     or a hint as to why you would then take a break to master 3D animation? (if not, what was it?)

     an attempt to represent the music, visually

      yes

      impossible. it was written 5 and a half years before

     no

      you can take any song very seriously. music is very serious and it can have powerful effects. i certainly take that stuff very seriously

      yes
